# Requirements Quality Checklist: Readability, SEO, Discovery

**Purpose**: Validate requirements clarity, completeness, and consistency for
readability, accessibility, SEO, and discovery improvements.
**Created**: 2026-02-09
**Feature**: /Users/arjunsurendran/code/web-resume/specs/001-readability-seo-discovery/spec.md

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are all target pages explicitly listed for scope coverage? [Completeness, Spec §Clarifications]
- [ ] CHK002 Are navigation/wayfinding requirements defined for all public pages? [Completeness, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK003 Are requirements specified for discovery artifacts beyond `sitemap.xml` and `robots.txt`? [Completeness, Spec §FR-007]
- [ ] CHK004 Are requirements defined for readability on large monitors and small screens? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-001]
- [ ] CHK005 Are requirements specified for JS-disabled viewing across all pages? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-003]
- [ ] CHK006 Are requirements defined for minor copy edits boundaries (what is allowed vs. disallowed)? [Completeness, Spec §FR-008]
- [ ] CHK007 Are requirements defined for the 404 page parity with accessibility/readability expectations? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-005]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK008 Is "clear typographic hierarchy" defined with measurable traits (e.g., size ratios, spacing)? [Clarity, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK009 Is "visible navigation cues" defined with objective criteria? [Clarity, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK010 Is "accurate metadata" defined with explicit matching rules to visible content? [Clarity, Spec §FR-003]
- [ ] CHK011 Is "complete discovery resources" defined in terms of which pages must be included? [Clarity, Spec §FR-004]
- [ ] CHK012 Is "above-the-fold usable within 1 second" defined in terms of measurable conditions? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-004]
- [ ] CHK013 Is "text remains comfortable and legible" quantified for readability judgments? [Clarity, Spec §User Story 1]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK014 Do page scope declarations align between Clarifications, Functional Requirements, and Assumptions? [Consistency, Spec §Clarifications, §FR-006, §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK015 Are accessibility requirements consistent across NFR-002 and NFR-005? [Consistency, Spec §NFR-002, §NFR-005]
- [ ] CHK016 Do discovery artifact requirements remain consistent between FR-004 and FR-007? [Consistency, Spec §FR-004, §FR-007]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK017 Are all success criteria measurable without subjective interpretation? [Measurability, Spec §SC-001..SC-005]
- [ ] CHK018 Are success criteria clearly linked to the user stories they validate? [Traceability, Spec §User Stories, §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK019 Are accessibility success criteria defined for every public page (not just primary pages)? [Completeness, Spec §SC-002]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK020 Are primary readability scenarios fully captured for both resume and homepage pages? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1]
- [ ] CHK021 Are discovery scenarios defined for all discovery artifacts (sitemap + llms files)? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 2]
- [ ] CHK022 Are owner validation scenarios defined with objective checks, not general review language? [Clarity, Spec §User Story 3]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK023 Are requirements defined for missing/incorrect discovery artifact updates when pages change? [Edge Case, Spec §Edge Cases]
- [ ] CHK024 Are requirements specified for long text sections that exceed optimal line length? [Edge Case, Spec §Edge Cases]
- [ ] CHK025 Are requirements defined for JavaScript-disabled behavior across all pages? [Edge Case, Spec §Edge Cases]
- [ ] CHK026 Are keyboard-only navigation requirements explicitly detailed for edge cases? [Edge Case, Spec §Edge Cases]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK027 Are performance targets complete and measurable for all public pages? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-004]
- [ ] CHK028 Are accessibility requirements stated for all interactive elements and states? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-002]
- [ ] CHK029 Are SEO/discovery requirements aligned with canonical URL rules? [Consistency, Spec §FR-005]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK030 Are assumptions about target browsers and static hosting validated or justified? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK031 Are dependencies explicitly listed and confirmed as none? [Completeness, Spec §Dependencies]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [ ] CHK032 Are any terms like "comfortable", "clear", or "accurate" still unquantified? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-001, §FR-003, §User Story 1]
- [ ] CHK033 Are there any conflicts between copy-edit scope and readability goals? [Conflict, Spec §FR-008]
- [ ] CHK034 Are any requirements implicitly asking for implementation choices? [Ambiguity, Spec §Requirements]

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
